snippet.title: And Yet It Moves WiiWare Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Run, jump and turn the world upside-down. Now on WiiWare!

The Trailer was made by a good friend of ours, Daniel Kauer http://www.danielkauer.at/

Find more information at http://www.andyetitmoves.net

And Yet It Moves is an award-winning physics-based platform game for WiiWare in which players rotate the game world at will to solve challenging puzzles. A tilt of the Wii Remote also tilts the world, turning walls into floors, slides into platforms, and stacks of rocks into dangerous hazards when flipped upside down.

Players navigate through a paper collage world created with colorful pieces of cardboard and set to distinctive music. With four different environments and multiple unlockable modes, And Yet It Moves is a platformer that will provide gamers with endless challenges.
